00025 template < typename T >
00026 class tlm_nonblocking_get_port :
00027 public sc_port< tlm_nonblocking_get_if< T > , 1 >
00028 {
00029 public:
00030   typedef tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T> get_if_type;
00031 
00032   tlm_nonblocking_get_port( const char *port_name ) :
00033     sc_port< tlm_nonblocking_get_if< T > , 1 >( port_name ) {}
00034

00036     
00037     return *new tlm_event_finder_t< get_if_type , T >(
00038              *this,
00039              &get_if_type::ok_to_get );
00040

00042 
00043 };
